name: load_and_show
description: Load a table and show tables
code:
load table users from "users.json"
show tables

name: simple_filter
code:
load table users from "users.json"
filter users where age > 25
select name, age

name: sort_and_limit
code:
load table users from "users.json"
filter users where age > 18
sort by age desc
limit 5
select name, age
